scripts.build-cf: rm -rf dist && npx tsx ../../packages/springboard/cli/src/cli.ts build ./modules/index.ts --platforms cf-workers,main
scripts.deploy-cf: npm run build-cf && npx wrangler deploy --with-vars
scripts.build-pk: rm -rf dist && npx tsx ../../packages/springboard/cli/src/cli.ts build ./modules/index.ts --platforms partykit,main --name jamtools-handraiser-app
